JOB DESCRIPTION: SFDC Coding-L2, (Mandatory) .As a Developer, you are responsible for development, support, maintenance and implementation of complex components of a project module. You should be able to work as an independent team member, capable of applying your own judgment in the areas of software development. You should have thorough knowledge of Salesforce, and the related clouds. Minimum work experience: 1 - 3 YEARS in Salesforce. You should be willing to work in shifts (UK and Aus Time). You should be willing to work on multiple projects requiring multiple Salesforce skills. You should be willing to help mentor/train team members. Minimum total experience required 2-3 Years. Position specific to Jaipur location, willing to relocate if needed.

EDUCATION.DOCTORATE: Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required
